scripts.deploy: scp -i "C:\Users\GauntletPaul\.ssh\paul_chiramel_rsa.pem" -r ./* ubuntu@ec2-52-10-62-41.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:~/ffmpeg-server/ && ssh -i "C:\Users\GauntletPaul\.ssh\paul_chiramel_rsa.pem" ubuntu@ec2-44-202-46-242.compute-1.amazonaws.com "cd ~/ffmpeg-server && docker-compose down -v && docker rmi $(docker images -q) && docker-compose up -d --build"
